guideLinesLanguagesLocale: Warning: Do not alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE and currentLocale fields. They are linked to the website language. For example, changing 'en' to 'en_US' will lead to a non-existent page (e.g., https://excellence-conciergerie.com/en_US). Existing locales are pt, en, fr, es. Do not add non-existent locales. Only modify based on the current translation file. fr/common.js currentLocale should always be 'fr', en/common.js currentLocale should always be 'en', etc.
guideLinesLinks: Warning: The only accepted values for the DO_NOT_CHANGE fields in navLinks are the current website IDs, which are as follows: about, whyUs, message, subscriptions, services, faq, contact
heroTitle:
Unforgettable Experiences and Discreet
Luxury Services on the French Riviera

introductionDescription.text: At Excellence Conciergerie, we exceed luxury standards by creating unforgettable memories and offering extraordinary services, always with absolute discretion.
For property owners, we safeguard your investment with transparent and efficient comprehensive management.
For travelers, we offer an exceptional and discreet experience comparable to the finest 5-star hotels, ensuring excellence, service, and attention to detail.

whyUsDescription: Discover why clients trust Excellence Conciergerie for exceptional luxury property management services. We blend expertise, personalization, and efficiency to manage properties with unparalleled professionalism and meticulous attention to detail.

whyUsReasons.title: Professionalism and Expertise
whyUsReasons.description: Our experienced team ensures comprehensive property management, maximizing visibility on prestigious platforms. Seasoned professionals craft compelling property descriptions to showcase unique features.

whyUsReasons.title: Personalized Service
whyUsReasons.description: We tailor solutions to meet your unique needs, ensuring a seamless and personalized experience throughout the management process. Our team prioritizes your goals to enhance property value and guest satisfaction.

whyUsReasons.title: Optimization of Profitability
whyUsReasons.description: Excellence Conciergerie employs strategic approaches to maximize rental income and investment returns for property owners. Through market analysis and effective management techniques, we ensure profitability.

whyUsReasons.title: Comprehensive Management
whyUsReasons.description: We provide complete property management services, offering peace of mind to property owners. From maintenance coordination to guest relations, our dedicated team ensures your property operates smoothly and efficiently.

whyUsReasons.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsReasons.description: We stay ahead with innovative solutions and insights into the luxury property market. Whether it’s implementing technology for efficient operations or adapting to market trends, we enhance property performance and guest satisfaction.

messageDescription: Welcome to Excellence Conciergerie. As the Managing Director, I am delighted to welcome you. For property owners, we care for your property with passion and confidentiality. For travelers, we promise an exceptional and discreet experience. Excellence Conciergerie represents refinement, discretion, and personal attention. Welcome to excellence.

services.title: Comprehensive Property Management
services.description: Excellence Conciergerie handles all aspects of managing your luxury property, ensuring both interior and exterior maintenance. Our detailed weekly reports provide transparent updates on every service, keeping you informed.

pros.text: Tailored solutions to meet your unique needs.

services.title: Exclusive Partnerships with Industry Leaders
services.description: We maintain exclusive partnerships with leading construction companies, architects, interior designers, landscapers, and more. This ensures superior quality interventions and enhances the value and appeal of your property.

pros.text: Access to top-tier professionals in the industry.
Tailored services to enhance property value and aesthetics.

services.title: Luxurious Outdoor Maintenance
services.description: Our dedicated teams preserve the beauty of your outdoor spaces, from meticulous garden upkeep to expert pool maintenance. We ensure your property's exterior remains a serene oasis.

pros.text: Expert care to enhance and beautify outdoor areas.
Tailored services to preserve and improve property aesthetics.
Regular upkeep to maintain pristine condition.
Specialized solutions for luxurious property maintenance.

services.title: Exclusive Personalized Services
services.description: We offer bespoke and exclusive services tailored to exceed your expectations in property management. From specialized care to transparent communication, we ensure excellence in every detail.

pros.text: Customized solutions for all your property needs.
Commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.
Personalized approach to meet unique client preferences.

packsSubtitle: The perfect plan for every lifestyle.

packs.title: Excellence Basic
packs.subTitle: Monday to Friday, from 8:30 AM to 5:30 PM

pros.text: Tailored solutions to meet your unique needs.

packs.title: Excellence Premium
packs.subTitle: 7 days a week, with flexible scheduling

pros.text: Priority access to our exclusive partners.
Exclusive access to our high-level services.

faq.title: What services does Excellence Conciergerie offer?
faq.description: Excellence Conciergerie offers a comprehensive range of luxury property management services, including maintenance, security, reservation management, and personalized services for both property owners and travelers.

faq.title: How does the 24/7 monitoring by Excellence Conciergerie work?
faq.description: Our 24/7 monitoring relies on advanced technologies and a dedicated team to ensure a swift response to any incidents, ensuring the complete security of your property.

faq.title: What are the benefits of Excellence Conciergerie's exclusive partnerships?
faq.description: Excellence Conciergerie maintains exclusive partnerships with construction companies, architects, interior designers, and other professionals. This ensures high-quality interventions to enhance and maintain your property's aesthetic value.

faq.title: Why choose Excellence Conciergerie for managing my luxury property?
faq.description: Excellence Conciergerie stands out for its commitment to excellence, transparency in every service provided, and ability to provide tailored solutions that precisely meet your needs. We are dedicated to ensuring your property remains immaculate and well-maintained at all times.

faq.title: What are the cancellation terms for Excellence Conciergerie's services?
faq.description: You can cancel our services at any time by contacting us directly. We strive to make the cancellation process as straightforward and transparent as possible for our clients.

faq.title: How can I make a special request to Excellence Conciergerie?
faq.description: For any special requests, whether it's specific needs for your property or customized services for an event, please contact us directly. We are here to accommodate your specific needs and provide a tailored solution.

contactDescription: Are you ready to elevate your hospitality and commit to excellence? Please fill out the form below, and our team will contact you shortly to discuss how we can help you deliver unforgettable stays to your clients.
guideLinesFormTypeOptions: Warning Text: Don't alter the DO_NOT_CHANGE fields. Don't add a new extra formTypeOptions object. Don't remove a existing object. If you need more forms options, contact me so I can insert it for you.
formTypeHelperText: If you have general inquiries, please fill out this form. If you are a property owner, please choose 'Owners' from the dropdown. If you are looking to purchase a subscription, select 'Subscriptions' from the dropdown.
thankYouForYourSubmission: Thank you for your submission. We will respond to you shortly.

array.title: 1. Introduction
array.description: Welcome to our website. If you continue to browse and use this website, you are agreeing to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our privacy policy govern our relationship with you in relation to this website.

array.title: 2. License to use website
array.description: Unless otherwise stated, we or our licensors own the intellectual property rights in the website and material on the website. Subject to the license below, all these intellectual property rights are reserved.

array.title: 3. Acceptable use
array.description: You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website; or in any way which is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful purpose or activity.

array.title: 4. Limitations of liability
array.description: We will not be liable to you (whether under the law of contact, the law of torts or otherwise) in relation to the contents of, or use of, or otherwise in connection with, this website: for any indirect, special or consequential loss; or for any business losses, loss of revenue, income, profits or anticipated savings, loss of contracts or business relationships, loss of reputation or goodwill, or loss or corruption of information or data.

array.title: 5. Acceptable use
array.description: You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website; or in any way which is unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful, or in connection with any unlawful, illegal, fraudulent or harmful purpose or activity.

array.title: 1. Information we collect
array.description: We may collect the following information: name, contact information including email address, demographic information such as postcode, preferences, and interests, other information relevant to customer surveys and/or offers.

array.title: 2. What we do with the information we gather
array.description: We require this information to understand your needs and provide you with a better service, and in particular for the following reasons: internal record keeping, improvement of our products and services, sending promotional emails about new products, special offers or other information which we think you may find interesting using the email address which you have provided.

array.title: 3. Security
array.description: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. In order to prevent unauthorized access or disclosure, we have put in place suitable physical, electronic and managerial procedures to safeguard and secure the information we collect online.

array.title: 4. How we use cookies
array.description: A cookie is a small file which asks permission to be placed on your computer's hard drive. Once you agree, the file is added and the cookie helps analyze web traffic or lets you know when you visit a particular site. Cookies allow web applications to respond to you as an individual. The web application can tailor its operations to your needs, likes and dislikes by gathering and remembering information about your preferences.

footerDescription: Excellence Conciergerie is a luxury real estate management agency based on the French Riviera. Our dedicated team provides personalized services to meet the unique needs of each property owner.
